title: Page scaffolding, info page, and registration
description:
## Objective

Create all page files, layout, and register FO-12 in navigation and overview.

## Spec Reference

**Spec:** docs/projects/2026-02-16-fo-12/2026-02-16-fo-12-spec.md — Sections: "Registration", "File Structure"

## Scope

**Files to create:**
- app/fo-12/page.tsx — Renders FOExperience component (same pattern as FO-11)
- app/fo-12/layout.tsx — Wraps with Fo12LayoutClient (same pattern as FO-11)
- app/fo-12/fo-12-layout-client.tsx — ImplementationProvider + TopSubmenu (based on FO-11)
- app/fo-12/info/page.tsx — Info page using InfoPageWrapper component

**Files to modify:**
- nav.config.ts — Add FO-12 nav entry after FO-11
- app/overview/page.tsx — Add FO-12 version card

## Implementation

1. **page.tsx:** Copy from FO-11, change import to fo-12 FOExperience
2. **layout.tsx:** Copy from FO-11, change import to fo-12 layout client
3. **fo-12-layout-client.tsx:** Copy from FO-11, change:
   - Import from '@/src/fo-12' instead of '@/src/fo-11'
   - Find navTree item for '/fo-12' instead of '/fo-11'
4. **info/page.tsx:** Create using InfoPageWrapper. Content per spec:
   - id: "FO-12", name: "Structured 30-Affirmation Journey"
   - tagline: "Guided selection with emotional check-ins"
   - Describe the 3-phase selection flow, check-in screens, 30-target, based-on-FO-11
5. **nav.config.ts:** Add entry after FO-11:
   { label: "FO-12", href: "/fo-12", children: [{ label: "Demo", href: "/fo-12" }, { label: "Info", href: "/fo-12/info" }] }
6. **overview/page.tsx:** Add FO-12 version card per spec Registration section

## Tests

1. Build passes — npm run build
2. Navigate to /fo-12 loads the page (manual check or E2E)

Run: npm run build

Do NOT close until build passes.
closed_reason: Created all page scaffolding and registration for FO-12. Files created: page.tsx, layout.tsx, fo-12-layout-client.tsx, info/page.tsx. Modified: nav.config.ts (added FO-12 nav entry after FO-11), overview/page.tsx (added FO-12 version card and comparison table row). npm run build passes successfully with /fo-12 and /fo-12/info routes.
